Prerequisite Help Tables

We have included below help tables listing courses available at Universities and Colleges throughout Utah that meet prerequisite course requirements for Rocky Mountain University of Health Professions Physician Assistant Program.

PLEASE NOTE: We strive to be as accurate as possible in completing the tables below. However, there may be courses that qualify for particular prerequisites that are not listed. Also important... the tables below are designed to highlight undergraduate-level courses meeting the prerequisites. If you have taken a graduate-level course you feel qualifies for a prerequisite, just ask!

Universities and Colleges List

  • ➘ Brigham Young–Provo (BYU-Provo)
  • ➘ Utah Valley University (UVU)
  • ➘ University of Utah (UofU)
  • ➘ Utah State University (USU)
  • ➘ Weber State University coming soon!
  • ➘ Dixie State College of Utah coming soon!
  • ➘ Westminster College coming soon!
  • ➘ Southern Utah University (SUU) coming soon!

Brigham Young University – Provo (BYU-Provo)

PREREQUISITE COURSE, COURSE SERIES, or COURSE COMBO
Human Anatomy PDBIO-2103 –OR– PDBIO-2203
Human Physiology PDBIO-3054 –OR– PDBIO-3623 & PDBIO-3631 combo
General Biology BIO-1304 –OR– PDBIO-1202 & MMBIO-2403 combo
Microbiology MMBIO-2213 & MMBIO-2221 combo –OR– MMBIO-4074
General Chem CHEM-1113 & CHEM-1123 & CHEM-1132 series
–OR– CHEM-1054 & CHEM-1063 & CHEM-1071 series
Statistics STAT-1213, STAT-1513, STAT-2013, –OR– PSYCH-3084
Math MATH-1103, MATH-1113, MATH-1124, –OR– MATH-1194
Psychology PSYCH-1113 –OR– PSYCH-3423
Med Terminology LATIN-1232 –OR– NURS-1022

back to list

Utah Valley University (UVU)

PREREQUISITE COURSE, COURSE SERIES, or COURSE COMBO
Human Anatomy ZOOL-23203 & ZOOL-23251 combo
Human Physiology ZOOL-24203 & ZOOL-24251 combo
General Biology BIOL-16104 & BIOL-16151 combo1
Microbiology MICR-20603 & MICR-20651 combo
–OR– MICR-34503 & MICR-34551 combo
General Chem CHEM-12104 & CHEM-12151 combo
–AND– CHEM-12204 & CHEM-12251 combo
Statistics MATH-20404 –OR– BESC-30104
Math MATH-10504 or higher
Psychology PSY-10103 –OR– PSY-34003
Med Terminology HLTH-13002

back to list

PREREQUISITE COURSE, COURSE SERIES, or COURSE COMBO

Human Physiology BIOL-24204
General Biology BIOL-12104

–OR– PATH-31003 & BIOL-32051 combo
General Chem CHEM-12104 & CHEM-12151 combo
–AND– CHEM-12204 & CHEM-12251 combo
Statistics SOC-31124 –OR– PSY-30004
Math MATH-10504 or higher
Psychology PSY-10104 –OR– PSY-34003
